item.title: Ban people & max players
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

Ahh, Some sources have it, Most don’t.

Try ::ipban I hax

If not, then just simply make a command for ip banning people.

item.title: Ban people & max players
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

What source are you using…?

Most sources have a ban command…

Say there was a player named “I hax,” on your server and was cheating / duping. You would do…

::banuser I hax

Or…

::ban I hax

Read full topic
